workflow.name: Create an intelligent Facebook Messenger chatbot with GPT-4o-mini & message memory
workflow.description:
## Who is this for?

  Businesses and developers who want to automate customer support or engagement on Facebook Messenger using AI-powered responses.

  ## What does it do?

  Creates an intelligent Facebook Messenger chatbot that:
  - Responds to messages using OpenAI (gpt-4o-mini)
  - Batches rapid-fire messages into a single AI request
  - Maintains conversation history (50 messages per user)
  - Shows professional UX feedback (seen indicators, typing bubbles)

  ## How it works

  1. **Webhook Verification** - Handles Facebook's GET verification request
  2. **Message Reception** - Receives incoming messages via POST webhook
  3. **Message Batching** - Waits 3 seconds to collect multiple quick messages
  4. **AI Processing** - Sends combined message to OpenAI with conversation context
  5. **Response Delivery** - Formats and sends the AI response back to Messenger

  ## Setup

  1. Configure **Facebook Graph API** credential with your Page Access Token
  2. Configure **OpenAI API** credential with your API key
  3. Set your verify token in the "Is Token Valid?" node
  4. Register the webhook URL in Facebook Developer Console

  ## Key Features

  - **Message Batching**: Combines "Hey" + "Can you help" + "with my order?" into one request
  - **Conversation Memory**: Remembers context from previous messages
  - **Echo Filtering**: Prevents responding to your own messages
  - **Response Formatting**: Cleans markdown for Messenger's 2000-char limit

workflow.name: Smart Facebook Messenger Chatbot with OpenAI

parameters.content:
# Facebook Messenger AI Chatbot

## Who is this for?
Businesses and developers who want to automate customer interactions on Facebook Messenger using AI.

## What does it do?
- Receives messages from Facebook Messenger
- Batches rapid consecutive messages together
- Processes messages with OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini)
- Maintains conversation memory
- Sends intelligent AI responses

## Setup Requirements
1. **Facebook App** with Messenger product enabled
2. **Facebook Page** connected to the app
3. **OpenAI API Key**

## Quick Start
1. Configure credentials (see setup notes)
2. Set your verify token in "Is Token Valid?" node
3. Publish the workflow
4. Configure Facebook webhook URL
5. Test by messaging your Facebook Page!

## 1. Webhook Verification

Facebook sends a GET request to verify your webhook URL during setup.

**How it works:**
1. Facebook sends `hub.verify_token` and `hub.challenge`
2. We validate the token matches your secret
3. If valid, return the challenge to confirm
4. If invalid, return 403 Forbidden

‚ö†Ô∏è **Important:** Change `YOUR_VERIFY_TOKEN_HERE` in the "Is Token Valid?" node to your own secret token.

## 2. Receive & Filter Messages

Handles incoming POST requests from Facebook when users send messages.

**How it works:**
1. Immediately acknowledge with `EVENT_RECEIVED` (required by Facebook)
2. Filter out:
   - Echo messages (messages we sent)
   - Non-text messages
   - Empty messages

‚úÖ Only valid user text messages proceed to processing.

## 3. Message Batching (Smart Feature!)

Users often send multiple quick messages. This section combines them into one request.

**How it works:**
1. Store each message in workflow static data
2. Send "seen" indicator so user knows we received it
3. Wait 3 seconds for additional messages
4. Combine all messages from the same user
5. Process as a single conversation turn

üí° **Benefit:** Reduces API calls and provides more context to the AI.

## 4. AI Agent Processing

The brain of the chatbot - powered by OpenAI.

**Components:**
- **OpenAI Chat Model:** Uses GPT-4o-mini for responses
- **Conversation Memory:** Remembers last 50 messages per user
- **AI Agent:** Processes messages with custom system prompt

**Features:**
- Maintains context across conversations
- Friendly, concise responses
- Respects Messenger's 2000 char limit

‚úèÔ∏è **Customize:** Edit the system prompt in the AI Agent node to change personality/behavior.

### OpenAI Credential Setup

1. Go to [OpenAI API Keys](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)
2. Click **Create new secret key**
3. Copy the key
4. In n8n: Click the OpenAI node ‚Üí Credential ‚Üí Create New
5. Paste your API key and save

## 5. Format & Send Response

**How it works:**
1. Format AI response for Messenger (remove markdown)
2. Truncate if over 1900 characters
3. Send via Facebook Graph API

**Response includes:**
- Proper recipient ID
- Message type: RESPONSE
- Clean, readable text

### Facebook Graph API Credential Setup

1. Create a Facebook App at [developers.facebook.com](https://developers.facebook.com)
2. Add **Messenger** product to your app
3. Connect a Facebook Page
4. Generate a **Page Access Token**
5. In n8n: Create Facebook Graph API credential
6. Paste the Page Access Token

options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful and friendly AI assistant for Facebook Messenger. Your responses should be:

1. Concise and conversational - suitable for chat format
2. Friendly but professional
3. Helpful and informative
4. Under 2000 characters (Messenger limit)

If the user asks about services or products, provide helpful information. Always be polite and end conversations gracefully when appropriate.

Remember: You're chatting via Messenger, so keep responses appropriate for that medium.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
